questions.question: How does Physically Based Rendering (PBR) improve textures in VR?

answers.a: It makes textures react realistically to light
answers.b: It increases the resolution of textures automatically
answers.c: It removes the need for UV mapping

questions.question: Why do VR developers use texture baking?

answers.a: To increase real-time rendering speed by precomputing lighting and shadows
answers.b: To create glowing effects for neon lights
answers.c: To add extra details to bump maps

questions.question: What is an advantage of procedural texturing in VR?

answers.a: It allows infinite texture variations without large file sizes
answers.b: It eliminates the need for UV mapping
answers.c: It is only useful for character design
